H0.text: what kind of animals live in the great victoria desert. Red Kangaroo

H1.text: what kind of animals live in the great victoria desert. Perentie

H2.text: what kind of animals live in the great victoria desert. Bilby

H3.text: what kind of animals live in the great victoria desert. dingo

A4.text: Perenties are found in the arid desert areas of Western Australia, South Australia, the Northern Territory, and Queensland.

A5.text: Found west of the Great Dividing Range in the arid areas of Australia, it is rarely seen because of its shyness and the remoteness of much of its range from human habitation.
